basic.description: Evidence for relativistic effects. Kinematics and dynamics in special relativity, Minkowski diagram, applications. Evidence for quanta, spectra, Bohr atom, quantum statistics. Descriptive nuclear physics, radioactivity, elementary particles. (5/30/0/4/0) ~ COURSE DELETED IN 2008/09 ~
basic.subject: ENPH
basic.title: Relativity And Quanta

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of APSC111 and APSC112 and registered in a BSCE Academic Program.
